data.title: Shop — Downtown Lynchburg Association
data.text:
Accents Flags, Gifts, Home & Garden

Nestled at the gateway to Downtown Lynchburg, this store is full of home and garden décor and gifts of all kinds. It features an extensive collection of seasonal flags, doormats, garden items, wreaths, pillows, plaques, florals and so much more.

Bailey Spencer Hardware

Online Store

Bailey Spencer has expanded to be more than just a hardware store, offering three stories of stock from commercial doors and hardware, architectural antiques, historic stained glass, doors, and columns to designing and producing Chippendale doors. They are a licensed and insured contractor bringing the best to Lynchburg and Central Virginia.

Bikes Unlimited

Online Store & Curbside Pickup

With over 75 years of combined bike experience, Bikes Unlimited gladly offers customers guidance on choosing just the right bike or accessory to make their riding experience more enjoyable. Whether you’re new to the sport of cycling or a seasoned veteran, this shop provides quality products, service and advice

Bowen Jewelry

Online Store

Whether you’re searching for that perfect diamond ring, a timepiece that will last a lifetime, or beautiful estate jewelry, Bowen Jewelry has all this and more to offer. A historic and well-established shop, stop by to browse, have something repaired, or simply to watch the artisans at work in the front window.

Buzzard’s Roost

Buzzard’s Roost is a unique antique store in downtown Lynchburg located in an old 1800s building on Commerce Street and across from Pacific Life. You never know what unique finds you may come across in this shop.

Church Street Bridal

Stop by this bridal shop to search for a truly one-of-a-kind wedding dress. Selling new designer gowns at affordable prices, the proceeds of these donated dresses benefit YWCA programs, so you can leave knowing your purchase made a positive difference.

Cotton Connection

This Main Street storefront offers a wide variety of t-shirts, signs, vehicle stickers and plenty of other sports and regional memorabilia. Custom orders and other options are also offered for all of your needs.

Empire Fleet Vintage

You’ll find vintage clothing and more at this specially curated shop. From dresses to jeans, these items were hand-picked to satisfy every vintage-lover’s need for all things old school. Empire Fleet Vintage is located right behind Grey’s on Fifth Street.

Enchanted

Enchanted is a first rate antiques shop specializing in 18th and 19th c. English, Continental and American antiques and decorative accessories. Also of note are the seasonal garden shop, fine gifts and personal accessories that round out this exceptional shopping experience! With the near wholesale pricing on quality antiques, you will see why Enchanted attracts clientele from all over the United States.

Estates & Consignments

Explore the great variety of antiques and vintage furniture in this large location on 12th Street just between Main and Commerce Streets. In this warehouse-size store, you’re sure to find something perfect for you.

Estates Revisited

This Main Street storefront not only sells antiques and estate items, they will also buy and sell partial and full estates. Come and visit Art Dodd, formerly of Estate Specialists, for input and information about all things estate.

Galaxie Modern

Galaxie Modern has a wide selection of mid-century modern furniture, lighting, art, and decor. In its new location on 13th Street in Downtown Lynchburg, Galaxie offers the quality of furniture, artwork, and accessories that its clientele have come to expect while also offering a full array of estate services.

GhostStop

GhostStop is the prominent and most highly recommended ghost-hunting equipment store and manufacturer. GhostStop designs and builds gear to aid you in your paranormal investigations. They are the only shop in town acutely focused on investigation technology with a manufacturing workshop and storefront trusted by teams and shows worldwide.
